com.noctarius.tengi.spi.connection

Interface Connection

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractConnection

    public interface Connection
extends AutoCloseable

    The Connection interface is the top level type of any kind of connections between client and server.

    Every connection is identified using a unique Id (Identifier) which can be used to identify same clients over multiple socket connections or reconnects (e.g. polling styled transports).

      Transport getTransport()

    • Method Detail

      • getConnectionId

        Identifier getConnectionId()
        Returns the unique connection Id which can be used to identify a connection over multiple connections or reconnects (e.g. polling connections).
        Returns:
        the unique identifier of this connection

      • getTransport

        Transport getTransport()
        Returns the transport that accepted this connection and handles the underlying data communication.
        Returns:
        the transport of this connection

      • addMessageListener

        Identifier addMessageListener(MessageListener messageListener)
        Adds a MessageListener to this connection.
        Parameters:
        messageListener - MessageListener instance to add
        Returns:
        a unique identifier for this registration

      • removeMessageListener

        void removeMessageListener(Identifier registrationIdentifier)

        Removes a previously registered MessageListener based on the Identifier returned from registration.

        Using this method anonymous listener implementations or Java 8 lambdas can be registered and removed.

        Parameters:
        registrationIdentifier - the Identifier generated while registration

      • addConnectionListener

        Identifier addConnectionListener(ConnectionListener connectionListener)
        Adds a ConnectionListener to this connection.
        Parameters:
        connectionListener - ConnectionListener instance to add
        Returns:
        a unique identifier for this registration

      • removeConnectionListener

        void removeConnectionListener(Identifier registrationIdentifier)

        Removes a previously registered ConnectionListener based on the Identifier returned from registration.

        Using this method anonymous listener implementations or Java 8 lambdas can be registered and removed.

        Parameters:
        registrationIdentifier - the Identifier generated while registration

      • writeObject

        <O> CompletableFuture<Message> writeObject(O object)
                                    throws Exception
        Writes a common object to this connection. This types needs to be serializable using a previously registered Marshaller or must be of a commonly supported (internally supported) type. Objects send using this method are automatically wrapped into a Message object before sent and will be delivered to a registered MessageListener on the receiver side.
        Parameters:
        object - object to write
        Returns:
        a CompletionFuture to add additional behavior after the object is written
        Throws:
        Exception

      • disconnect

        CompletableFuture<Connection> disconnect()
        Disconnects the connection and releases any internally acquired resources that are assigned to this connection.
        Returns:
        a CompletionFuture to add additional behavior (like cleanup) after the connection is closed
